content: the dramatic big sister to the saturday shrug sunday is a simple bold design that can be knit in a day can t stop won t stop #shrugstyle sample shown mc lamb & kid monstro martian held with dimond laine big birdie martian cc lamb & kid monstro lean to held with dimond laine big birdie blackbird sizes one size finished measurements 20 tall x 15 wide yarn requirements approximately 200 yds of ea color and fiber suggested needles us size 15/10 mm 32 gauge 10 sts in 1x1 rib
